entries.name: to_html(token_stream)
entries.desc: Converts token_stream to HTML wrapping various tokens with <span> elements. Some tokens types are wrapped in spans with the given class names. Other token types are not wrapped in spans.

entries.name: add_token(token)
entries.desc: Adds one token to the collected tokens

entries.name: add_tokens(tokens)
entries.desc: Adds tokens to the collected tokens

entries.name: pop_token()
entries.desc: Remove the last token from the collected tokens

entries.name: tokens_to_s()
entries.desc: Returns a string representation of the token stream
